Package org.neo4j.kernel.api.index

  • Interface Summary 
    Interface Description
    IndexAccessor
    Used for online operation of an index.
    IndexConfigProvider
    Inherited by IndexAccessor and IndexPopulator.
    IndexDirectoryStructure.Factory
    Creates an IndexDirectoryStructure for a IndexProviderDescriptor for an IndexProvider.
    IndexEntriesReader  
    IndexPopulator
    Used for initial population of an index.
    IndexPopulator.JobDescriptionSupplier
    Supplier of a description of the submitted job.
    IndexPopulator.PopulationWorkScheduler
    A scheduler for delegating index population related jobs to other threads.
    IndexProgressor
    The index progressor is a cursor like class, which allows controlled progression through the entries of an index.
    IndexProgressor.EntityTokenClient
    Client which accepts nodes and some of their labels.
    IndexProgressor.EntityValueClient
    Client which accepts nodes and some of their property values.
    IndexProvider.Monitor  
    IndexReader
    Reader for an index.
    IndexSampler
    Component able to sample schema index.
    IndexUpdater
    IndexUpdaters are responsible for updating indexes during the commit process.
    IndexValueValidator  
    MinimalIndexAccessor
    Minimal index accessor used for dropping failed indexes and provide index configuration.
    NonUniqueIndexSampler
    Builds index sample.
  • Class Summary 
    Class Description
    AbstractIndexReader  
    BridgingIndexProgressor
    Combine multiple progressor to act like one single logical progressor seen from client's perspective.
    IndexAccessor.Adapter  
    IndexAccessor.Delegating  
    IndexDirectoryStructure
    Dictates how directory structure looks for an IndexProvider and its indexes.
    IndexDirectoryStructure.SubDirectoryByIndexId  
    IndexPopulator.Adapter  
    IndexPopulator.Delegating  
    IndexProvider
    Contract for implementing an index in Neo4j.
    IndexProvider.Adaptor  
    IndexProvider.Delegating  
    IndexProvider.Monitor.Adaptor  
    IndexQueryHelper  
    IndexReader.Adaptor  
    IndexSample  
    LoggingMonitor  
    NonUniqueIndexSampler.Adapter  
    UniqueIndexSampler
